title: Update site profile/logo display picture to the latest uploaded image

requirements.text: Update the site profile/logo image to reflect the newly uploaded file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" by regenerating the existing generated profile image asset used on the landing page hero (keep the same referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png").

quotes: The user has uploaded 1 image(s): WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg.

acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero logo ( in frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) visually matches the newly uploaded image.
The hero logo continues to load from /assets/generated/kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png (no broken image).
The updated profile/logo image is square and looks good at the existing hero sizes (w-32/h-32 and w-40/h-40).

requirements.text: Update the site favicon to reflect the newly uploaded file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" by regenerating the existing generated favicon asset referenced in frontend/index.html (keep the same referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png").
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab favicon visually matches the newly uploaded image.
frontend/index.html continues to reference /assets/generated/kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png with no 404s.

requirements.text: Ensure the updated profile/logo image derived from "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" does not contain any user-facing text that contradicts the current site content, specifically it must not show "Cardiology" as an available service/department.
acceptanceCriteria: The final generated profile/logo image does not display the word "Cardiology" anywhere.
The final generated favicon does not display the word "Cardiology" anywhere.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths must not be edited directly; compose them instead.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change hospital phone numbers, email, address, or other contact copy as part of this request.
Do not add new departments or reintroduce Cardiology anywhere in the site content.

edits: Replace the profile/logo image with the newly uploaded picture while removing/avoiding any visible "Cardiology" service text (kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png > kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png)

Replace the favicon image with one derived from the newly uploaded picture while removing/avoiding any visible "Cardiology" service text (kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png > kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
